summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ODDSIDE poker night enhanced game features. All 35 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend landing page and login page load correctly on both desktop and mobile viewports. Protected routes correctly redirect to login.
passed_tests: API root endpoint (/api/) returns correct message
API health check
Auth /api/auth/me with valid session token
Auth /api/auth/me without token returns 401
User search requires authentication
User search with valid query returns results
User search with short query returns empty
Get invites requires authentication
Get invites returns list
Get badges requires authentication
Get badges returns badge data with level, stats, badges
Create group creates group successfully
Get groups returns user's groups
Get group details returns group with members

Invite member to non-existent group returns 403
Full invite member flow works correctly
Get stats returns user statistics
Get notifications returns list
Get balances returns balance data
Create game night successfully
Get game details returns game with players
Start game requires minimum 2 players
Admin buy-in requires authentication
Admin buy-in returns 404 for non-existent game
Admin buy-in for host player works correctly
Admin buy-in with fixed denominations ($5, $10, $20, $50, $100) all work
Admin buy-in for non-player returns 400
Admin buy-in for other player in game works
Cash-out requires authentication
Cash-out with chip count (profit scenario) calculates correctly
Cash-out with chip count (loss scenario) calculates correctly
Get game thread returns messages
Post message to game thread works
Transaction history tracked per player
Landing page loads with ODDSIDE branding (desktop)
Landing page loads with ODDSIDE branding (mobile)
Login page loads with all form elements (desktop)
Login page loads with all form elements (mobile)
Protected routes redirect to login when not authenticated
critical_code_review_comments: GameNight.jsx has all required data-testid attributes for testing
Poker hand rankings image URL is accessible and correctly configured
Admin buy-in API endpoint correctly validates host/admin permissions
Cash-out with chip count correctly calculates net result
Transaction history per player is tracked and displayed
Mobile-responsive design uses proper Tailwind breakpoints (sm:, md:, lg:)

success_rate.frontend: 100% (landing page, login page load correctly on desktop and mobile)
